onbon.y2.play

Class ProgramPlayFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • onbon.y2.play.ProgramFile
      • onbon.y2.play.ProgramPlayFile

  • public class ProgramPlayFile
extends ProgramFile
    The program play file defines areas which to be played on the screen.
    Author:
    ONBON
    See Also:
    Audio, Animation, Clock, Counter, Chinese Calendar, DateTime, Marquee, Picture, Text, ColorText, Video

      • isRepeat

        public boolean isRepeat()
        Tests if the program is played repeatedly or not.
        是否连播，不连续播放表示播完一遍，切换其他同等优先级次数未满的节目。
        Returns:
        true if the program is played repeatedly.
